snippet: In a 30-second advertisement, Joseph J. Lhota, the Republican mayoral nominee, attacks Bill de Blasio, the Democratic nominee, for criticizing charter schools.
abstract: In a 30-second advertisement, Joseph J. Lhota, the Republican mayoral nominee, attacks Bill de Blasio, the Democratic nominee, for criticizing charter schools.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: Looking for a Boost, Lhota Turns the Focus to Charter Schools
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: Looking for a Boost, Lhota Turns the Focus to Charter Schools
